name: Three Champions
description:
In the world of Three Champions, fighting in combat is the only way to prove your strength, yet one cubes tries to find another way. To prove a peaceful solution can be made, this cube needs to dodge every attack coming their way to beat the Three Champions. Are you up to the task?

Made for the Games for Change Student Challenge

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Restart Fight - R

Credits:

Game and Art - GoldenBot

Music - Kevin Macleod

Note: Pressing P to pause only works on the downloadable version. The browser version will stop the music and not play it again.
